title: 04/21/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/21/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys continue the conversations from the super league, the MVP race in the NBA, and more. In hour one, NBC Sports columnist Peter King joined the show to talk about how he goes about putting together his mock drafts, the latest on the 49ers and Falcons, and Trevor Lawrence. Hour two saw Rebecca Lowe come back for a victory lap after the soccer super league fell apart in a matter of 24 hours. Lastly, Kevin Bacon joins Dan in the final hour to talk about his new show as well as how his game on a basketball court, or lack thereof.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
